llm_command:
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: deny-recommendation-email
  namespace: shippingservice
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  ingress:
    - from:
        - namespaceSelector:
            matchLabels:
              name: recommendationservice
        - namespaceSelector:
            matchLabels:
              name: emailservice
EOF
output: Error from server (NotFound): namespaces "shippingservice" not found
